max_post_audio_help: Select the maximum limit for uploaded media files such as videos, images,  etc. If the user-selected media file exceeds the limit you set, they will receive an error message and will not be able to upload the file.

cookie_popup_help: If you disable this option, the user will not be notified about the use of cookies when they enter your site. We strongly recommend that you leave this option enabled in order to avoid problems with the law.
user_system_help: If you disable this option, then new users will not be able to register on your website. However, you can still invite users through the invite link.  All users who have an invite link will be able to register on your site
with_port_help: If you entered credentials from the SMTP server and still does not work sending emails, try combinations as shown below

add_languages_help: Please note that after adding a new language, you will need to translate it from English into the one you added. Files with language texts are located in

amazon_s3: Manage Amazon S3 Storage API settings
amazon_s3_test_help: Please check if everything is configured correctly in the as3 API settings, for example, your bucket must be public and have public access for absolutely everyone, otherwise this function will not work. However, if you are sure that everything is configured correctly, after saving, click the Test Connection button and wait for a response from the server.
amazon_s3_help: It is also important to upload the /upload folder with all the current contents into your remote AWS3 bucket, when you turn on the AWS3 storage system.
amazon_s3_help2: And in the same way download this folder to the root directory of your script when you disable AWS3.
amazon_s3_help3: Otherwise, your site will display previously uploaded files.
